Class GeneralRepositoryServer

  • java.lang.Object

    public class GeneralRepositoryServer
extends GeneralRepository
implements IServer
    General Repository Server that extends the General Repository and will process the events of the Server.
    Author:
    Tiago Henriques nmec: 73046; Miguel Oliveira nmec: 72638
